author: kyHwangs
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is for adding tag-and-probe efficiency on Muon HLT offline DQM. 

As reported and discussed on [TSG](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1635530/#sc-1-5-muon-pog) and [MuonPOG](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1638450/#17-hlt-dqm-with-multirun-harve) meeting, original DQM plots are kept unchanged while adding the new plots.

#### PR validation:

In order to validate this PR, below commands are suggested.

```cmsDriver.py step3 -s RAW2DIGI,L1Reco,RECO,PAT,DQM:@standardDQM+@miniAODDQM --conditions 150X_dataRun3_Prompt_v1 -n 30 --datatier DQMIO --data --eventcontent DQM --era Run3_2025 --filein /store/data/Run2025G/Muon0/RAW/v1/000/397/954/00000/11cdedf5-d5ec-46bd-8292-7884460971bb.root```

```cmsDriver.py step4 -s HARVESTING:@standardDQM+@miniAODDQM --conditions 150X_dataRun3_Prompt_v1 --filetype DQM --era Run3_2025 -n -1 --filein file:step3_RAW2DIGI_L1Reco_RECO_PAT_DQM.root```

After running both commands, there is an output named `DQM_V0001_R000397954__Global__CMSSW_X_Y_Z__RECO.root`. By exploring this ROOT file and checking whether plots are saved correctly under `HLT/Run Summary/Muon/DistributionsTnP`, validation could be done.

Following the [PRWorkflow](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html), tests were done. `scram b runtests use-ibeos` was successfully done and also `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` was done without errors.
title: Adding TnP efficiency on MuonHLT offline DQM
